QuestData.Title: Twin Temptresses
QuestData.Description: Moora and Salia are the personal servants of Shadow Lord Fel'dan. Do not be deceived by them!$B$BThese foul succubi use their wiles and foul magic to draw mortals deep into Shadow Hold. Those in their grasp undergo brainwashing, or are sacrificed by Fel'dan to his demonic masters.$B$BThe two fight as one and are never found apart, making them a considerable threat. Proceed further into Shadow Hold and slay them.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: You must resist their sinister temptations.
QuestData.RewardText: Another demonic menace gone. It is time to find their master.
